questions.question: What is your company name?
questions.description: Used throughout the document to personalize the guidelines

questions.question: What is your company website URL?
questions.description: Used in document metadata to identify the website these guidelines apply to

questions.question: What version number should this document be?
questions.description: Used for version control and tracking document updates

questions.question: When should these guidelines go into effect?
questions.description: Used to track when the guidelines become active

questions.question: When was this document last reviewed?
questions.description: Used to track document review history

questions.question: Who approved this document?
questions.description: Used to identify who has authority over these guidelines

questions.question: Describe your primary target audience for the website
questions.placeholder: Mid-market B2B technology companies looking for enterprise software solutions...
questions.description: Used to align content with audience needs and expectations

questions.question: What visitor intent categories should your website address?
questions.description: Define how your content should align with different visitor intents

questions.question: What metrics will you use to measure website content performance?
questions.description: Define how you'll measure the effectiveness of your content

questions.question: How often should these guidelines be reviewed?
questions.description: Used to establish a regular review schedule

questions.question: Who is responsible for reviewing and updating these guidelines?
questions.placeholder: Content Marketing Manager, Marketing Director, Product Marketing
questions.description: Used to assign ownership for maintaining the guidelines

questions.question: What is the approval process for updates to these guidelines?
questions.placeholder: Draft by Content Manager, review by Marketing Director, final approval by VP Marketing
questions.description: Used to define the workflow for making changes to the guidelines

questions.question: Which specific page types on your website should these guidelines apply to?
questions.description: Used to define the scope of where these guidelines apply
